div.p: ... they carried off four goatskins and four fleeces. Wherefore I entreat you to give instructions to the village inspector to hold the due inquiry, and to keep the persons found guilty in a safe place that they may receive fitting punishment. Farewell. Papontos, about fifty-five years old, having a scar on his right eyebrow. The 18th year of Hadrianus Caesar the lord, Athur 28. Translation: B.P. Grenfell – A.S. Hunt, P.Fay. 107
